dialogue.text: Boyfriend! I-I don't know what happened!
I saw you fall asleep on the sidewalk, and everything suddenly went dark...
And when I woke up, I was being crowd\nsurfed by a bunch of LEXI CLONES!
Hey, those aren't clones, those are my\nfriends!
Well, tell your FRIENDS to wear more\ndistinguishable clothing!
Girlfriend, that's... that's awful! Somebody must have done something to you!
And I think I may have a wild guess as to who it was...
I didn't do anything to Girlfriend, I swear!
All I did was put her to sleep with a\ntranquilizer dart, but nothing bad or\n anything!
you WHAT?
WHY WOULD YOU DO SOMETHING LIKE\n THAT IN YOUR RIGHT MIND?
I was just... making sure my plan wouldn't have any disruptions or anything...
By SHOOTING MY GIRLFRIEND WITH A DART? And what PLAN are you even talking about?
I knew you were going to fall asleep by the end of my second song.
It was no coincidence that you were\nsurrounded when you woke up.
But look, you're crowded with admirers! Don't you like it?
NO, I most certainly do NOT like it!
And what you're saying is that you sucked every last ounce of energy out of my body...
...and shot my girlfriend with a dart...
...just to get what you and your friends\nwanted?
I mean, that's only half of it, but I guess that's one way to put it.
Unbelievable.
Come on Girlfriend, let's get out of here\nbefore she puts you in danger again.
D-danger?
Lexi... I sincerely hope you get whatever help you need.
And don't even THINK about following us\nhome!
GUYS, I CAN EXPLAIN! PLEASE DON'T...
They're gone.
Is that... …is that all true, Lexi?
You shot his Girlfriend with a\nTRANQUILIZER DART to get us here?
Yeah, but only because I thought it was what you wanted...
You didn't tell us you were gonna do THAT!\nI thought you'd just ask them nicely or\nsomething!
Do you not see how wrong that is?
Yeah, Lexi... my entire life revolves around obsessing over Boyfriend, and even I think that was too extreme.
Guys, I had no idea...
I thought I was doing something nice the whole time...
For both you all AND Boyfriend...
I guess I was too focused on meeting my idol to realize the harm I caused to achieve it.
Well, what do we do now? Our idol hates us, and we just made an awful image for\nourselves.
You know guys, as much as I hate to say it...
...maybe it's time we give up the whole\n fangirling gig.
Not just because of Boyfriend snapping at me... as much as it stings, I think his\nreaction was warranted.
But this whole situation has just made me realize how nothing good comes out of us obsessing over him at such extreme levels.
I'll always admire him and his work, but\nit’'s time to stop making it our only defining trait.
Actually, I've been wanting to step down from the Unofficial Boyfriend Fanpage for a while.
I've been wanting to expand my account into digital art for a long time!
I'm okay with giving up fangirling. I hate people knowing me online as the ''“Boyfriend lover.''
I want people to start liking me for who I really am!
I never liked Boyfriend anyway, I just\nwanted to be part of a friend group!
I don't even know how I got here.
Wow, I didn't expect the decision to be\nso... unanimous.
It looks like it's settled then! Let's leave all of this behind us and start becoming our own people!
I guess I won't be needing this cheap cosplay anymore...
Come on, guys, let's go back to my place and have our first non-Boyfriend related hangout!
